niagara.optimizer.rules
Class Antecedent

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.rules.Pattern
      niagara.optimizer.rules.Antecedent

public class Antecedent
extends Pattern

Antecedent patterns for ConstructedRules. A node in an antecedent pattern is an operator, with an optional identifying name.

getAddresses

public void getAddresses(byte[] currentAddress,
                         java.util.HashMap addresses)
An address is a sequence of numbers that identify the position of this node in the pattern (e.g. [2, 3, 0] is the address of the 0th child of the 4th child of the 3rd child of the root)
